Favorite Places

The first thing I do when I travel to other country is to visit their Churches. Here is my top 5 favourite Churches

Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourvière Lyon, France
Pilgrimage Church of Wies Steingaden, Germany
Notre-Dame Cathedral of Saigon Saigon, Vietnam
National Shrine of St. Alphonsus, FSSP Maryland, USA
Santissima Trinità dei Pellegrini Roma, Italy
